subject: Re: [junit] Redirect requested but followRedirects is disabled
msgSnippet: Saldin, You may find HtmlUnit gurus here, but would you have more luck on the HtmlUnit list? http://sourceforge.net/mail/?group_id=47038 David Saff
messageBody:
Saldin,

You may find HtmlUnit gurus here, but would you have more luck on the
HtmlUnit list?

http://sourceforge.net/mail/?group_id=47038

David Saff

saldin samuel wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I am getting the following error on using HtmlUnit. I
> tried searching for a solution but I couldnt. It would
> be great if you could provide me an "how-to" to solve
> this issue.
>
>
